getDeployedName

public static java.lang.String getDeployedName(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI aModuleURI)
                                        throws UnresolveableURIException

A fully-qualified module URI will contain enough information to determine the deployed name of the module.

Parameters:
aModuleURI - A valid, fully-qualified module URI
Returns:
The deployed name of the WorkbenchModulereferenced by the module URI
Throws:
UnresolveableURIException - If the supplied module URI is invalid or unresolveable.
